review_data.title: Real Thai food
review_data.content: Thank you for grate experience.. That visit remaind me how much I miss Thailand. Very good green curry. Sticky rise with durian.. Hmm 🙂😘

review_data.title: Excellent and fresh food
review_data.content: Very good food for a good price in Zurich. It is off the main city center but well worth the visit. We had excellent meals which were suggested to us from the owner.

review_data.title: Absoluter Geheimtip
review_data.content: Klein & fein ist dieses Thai Restaurant. Authentische und herrliche Thai Küche. Eine grosse Auswahl!

review_data.title: rutchy

review_data.title: Business/working Lunch
review_data.content: We ordered through eat.ch for a business meeting. The food is very tasty and not expensive. we had a yellow curry, green curry and Nua Naman. We also ordered Satai, Wantan and Spring Rolls. The Spring Rolls were very crispy. The Satai chicken was nicely...More

review_data.title: Savitree

review_data.title: Cosy nice place
review_data.content: Very friendly owner. The food is prepared with love and the owner, a Thai lady, is eager to get the customers happy. Beer from the tab is a plus.
